[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib
import Mathlib.Data.Finset.Basic

open Nat Set

abbrev P2020AMCA_4_answer : ℕ := sorry
theorem P2020AMCA_4 : 
  Finset.card (Finset.filter (fun n => 1000 ≤ n ∧ n ≤ 9999 ∧ (∀ d ∈ digits 10 n, Even d) ∧ 5 ∣ n) (Finset.Icc 1000 9999)) = P2020AMCA_4_answer := by sorry. Enumerated answers: 2000
